mapper.insert: INSERT INTO course_offerings ( course_index, course_year, course_semester, course_class_id, course_of_week, course_start, course_end, course_locate, course_content, teacher_id, enrollment) VALUES ( #{courseIndex}, #{courseYear}, #{courseSemester}, #{classId}, #{courseOfWeek}, #{courseStart}, #{courseEnd}, #{courseLocate}, #{courseContent}, #{userId}, #{enrollment} )
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) as count FROM user_info a WHERE a.permission_id = 3 AND a.class_id = #{classId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO course_score (course_dep, course_id, course_year, course_semester, course_class_id, student_id, teacher_id) SELECT c.course_dep, c.course_id, b.course_year, b.course_semester, b.course_class_id, a.user_id, b.teacher_id FROM user_info a LEFT JOIN course_offerings b ON a.class_id = b.course_class_id LEFT JOIN course_info c ON b.course_index = c.course_index WHERE a.permission_id = 3 AND c.course_required = '1' AND b.course_year = #{courseYear}
